tokens.text: detects when specific blocks are broken nearby

fields.title: Break
fields.description: List of blocks to watch for being broken to fire off a specified event. If a block is in multiple lists, multiple events will fire.

fields.title: Block List
fields.description: List of blocks that trigger the on_block_broken event.

fields.title: On Block Broken
fields.description: Event to call when a block in block_list is broken.

fields.title: Sources
fields.description: List of sources that break the block to listen for. If none are specified, all block breaks will be detected.
